creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: valley with waterfall and cascading river through center; two figures at lower center of image walk towards shore; tall bluff at L; group of huts on either side of river linked by small bridge
inscription: (Beside the flowing waters and reposing rocks, / I bathe in hot springs among mountain streams; / Although this is the bad habit of the mountain man, / How can this healing be a bad thing?) [trans. by Steven Addiss]
title: Hot Baths at Shibu
